basicInfo.name: Elysia
basicInfo.flavor: Elysia learns from Baron Lune that she is the eighth princess and starts a revolution for the betterment of Terra.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 130% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Heavenly Spark
Skill 1.desc:
All Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 80% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - Deals Fixed damage equal to 775 1 time(s).
 - Deals Fixed damage equal to 1285 1 time(s).
 - 50% chance to inflict Silence. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 1285 Fixed damage.
 - Increases Chance: Silence chance becomes 60%.

Skill 2.name: Starfall
Skill 2.desc:
All Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict Buff Duration Reduction. [Reduced by: 2 Turn(s)]
 - 100% chance to inflict Increased Miss Chance. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 115% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Effect: Increased Miss Chance to 48%.
超越6段階達成効果
 - Increases Effect: Buff Duration Reduction becomes 3 turn(s).

Passive.name: Leader of the Revolution
Passive.desc:
All Enemies
 - Inflicts Defense Reduction. [Always Active]
 - Self
 - Grants a Barrier equal to 160% of the caster's Physical Attack. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)] [Once per Round]
 - Grants All Damage Immunity when HP falls to 50% or lower. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)] [Once per Battle]
 - All Allies
 - Grants 2 Debuff Removal(s) upon activating a skill 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Effect: Defense Reduction to 24%.
超越2段階達成効果
 - Self
 - Adds Healing: Heals HP equal to 165% of the caster's Physical Attack when HP falls to 50% or lower. [1 Time(s) per Battle]

Passive (Trans).name: Leader of the Revolution
Passive (Trans).desc:
4 Allies
スキル強化効果
 - Grants 2 Debuff Removal(s).

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Rudy, Kyrielle, Ryan, dreams, peace, well-tended farm, soup with hearty meat chunks
profile.dislikes: Rudy, the king, the queen, giving up, battle rations, war, nobility
profile.story: Elysia learns from Baron Lune that she is the eighth princess and starts a revolution for the betterment of Terra.

basicInfo.name: Elysia
basicInfo.flavor: Elysia is highly sociable, has many friends, and her swordsmanship is unmatched by anyone within her school. She worships the Goddess of Light and admires the Knight of Light.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 90% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 90% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Heavenly Spark
Skill 1.desc:
All Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 75% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - Deals Fixed damage equal to 510 1 time(s).
 - 45% chance to inflict Silence. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 75% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Damage: To 51 Fixed damage.

Skill 2.name: Starfall
Skill 2.desc:
All Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 90% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict Buff Duration Reduction. [Reduced by: 2 Turn(s)]
 - 100% chance to inflict Increased Miss Chance. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 90% of Physical Attack.

Passive.name: Leader of the Revolution
Passive.desc:
All Enemies
 - Inflicts Defense Reduction. [Always Active]
 - Self
 - Grants a Barrier equal to 145% of the caster's Physical Attack. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)] [Once per Round]
 - Grants All Damage Immunity when HP falls to 50% or lower. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)] [Once per Battle]
 - All Allies
 - Grants 2 Debuff Removal(s) upon activating a skill 1 time(s).

Passive (Trans).name: Leader of the Revolution
Passive (Trans).desc:
4 Allies
スキル強化効果
 - Grants 2 Debuff Removal(s).

basicInfo.name: Elysia
basicInfo.flavor: Elysia's mother died during childbirth, and she was branded a child who killed her own mother and abandoned. Baron Lune took her in and raised her as his own daughter. She doesn't know she's adopted.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 80% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 80% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Heavenly Spark
Skill 1.desc:
All Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 65% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - Deals Fixed damage equal to 305 1 time(s).
 - 40% chance to inflict Silence. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 65% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Damage: To 30.5 Fixed damage.

Skill 2.name: Starfall
Skill 2.desc:
All Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 80% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict Buff Duration Reduction. [Reduced by: 1 Turn(s)]
 - 100% chance to inflict Increased Miss Chance. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 80% of Physical Attack.

Passive.name: Leader of the Revolution
Passive.desc:
All Enemies
 - Inflicts Defense Reduction. [Always Active]
 - Self
 - Grants a Barrier equal to 130% of the caster's Physical Attack. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)] [Once per Round]
 - Grants All Damage Immunity when HP falls to 50% or lower. [Duration: 1 Turn(s)] [Once per Battle]
 - All Allies
 - Grants 1 Debuff Removal(s) upon activating a skill 1 time(s).

Passive (Trans).desc:
4 Allies
スキル強化効果
